StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Currently working at Luharia Technology pvt.ltd as Data Scientist Done B.Tech from Indian Institute of Technology Madras Introduction to Machine learning Data Science for Engineers Supply Chain Analytics

PositionHistory.Title: Data Scientist
PositionHistory.Description:
Defaulter Prediction Exploration of data using matplotlib and seaborn for understanding data; helped for feature engineering and outlier detection Categorical column treatment is performed by one-hot-encoding, labelencoding, ratio encoding for the ordinal variable Missing value treatment is performed using most frequent, fancyimputer, few are left untreated Preprocessing of the columns having a different scale Treating highly imbalanced data using oversampling smote imblearn library Built a highly robust prediction model using lgboost: evaluation is performed by multi log loss, confusion matrix report
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 108160313310f005808160d5a4e5e6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580666755 2/2/20 19'09
Cohort Analysis: This analysis to make a business decision and visualize retention percentage of borrower and lender
Chat Bot: Used rasa nlu for intent and entity classification in md and yml file using embedded spacy and embedded sklearn classifier Used rasa core for dialogue management using stories and domain by core policy

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 37% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Chemical) from Indian Institute of Technology Madras in 2019
